name: Teddy Saves the Garden
description:
This is my submission for Lame Jam 26 made with Bitsy: https://bitsy.org/

I've been wanting to try out Bitsy for a while now because it looked simple to get into. I thought the lame jam was a good opportunity to learn it. If my first project with this new tool turned out to be a dud I could just say that it was meant to fit the "lame" concept of this jam. But using it is even easier than I imagined. It only took me a few hours to learn how to use Bitsy and to make this game. It's still kind of lame though. It just takes a couple of minutes to play and the implementation of the theme is lacking. But again lame is the name of the game in this jam!

The premise is simple: You're a teddy bear scouring Joe's huge garden for toxic weeds to save his plants.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to walk

Walk into white sprites to interact

Enter, Space, or Movement Keys to Progress Dialogue
